Certified Victim Advocate

+ Reviews and assesses violent crime reports as reported to the police by crirne victims,

» Contacts victims of violent crimes (particularly domestic violence); provide information

Provides ernotional support and crisis intervention for victims of crime.

* Obtain restitution inforrnation from victims and provide alternate means for the victim to be

Victim Advocate

Serves as a liaison between Victims, Prosecution and Court Staff,
